long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension changes LaTeX text in Slack channels to human readable images.

USAGE EXAMPLE
1. Open Slack (browser version)
2. Send a message with some LaTeX text to other user (e.g. "$ x^{3} $")
3. The extension will replace your LaTeX math formulas with easy-to-read images
